    • Method Detail

      • findBars

        IBar[] findBars(double latitude,
                double longitude,
                java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> favoriteBeers)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Returns all bars in your neighboring environment which serves at least one of your favorite beers
        Parameters:
        latitude - Current latitude, center-point of search
        longitude - Current longitude, center-point of search
        favoriteBeers - List of beers to search for
        Returns:
        List of Bars within 10km which serve at least one of favoriteBeers
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - invalid longitude or latitude data: longitude outside [-180,180] or latitude outside [-90,90], empty favoriteBeers list
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - data base errors

      • getAllBars

        IBar[] getAllBars()
           throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Returns an array of all bars saved in the database
        Returns:
        Array of all bars
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - database errors

      • getPostsFromBar

        IPost[] getPostsFromBar(int barID)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                        java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Returns all Posts for a specific bar
        Parameters:
        barID - ID of the bar whose posts are returned
        Returns:
        Array of posts for a given bar
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - no bar with ID barID found in database.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - database errors.

      • deleteBar

        void deleteBar(int barID)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Deletes a bar from the database.
        Parameters:
        barID - ID of the bar to be deleted.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - database errors.
